body:
Comment 3: 
Just for my own information, if there is a bug like this that I think I can fix (mine
wasn't wrong, it was just lacking 
extra cleanup and a test, right?), should I just submit a patch on the bug report or
should I go ahead and submit 
the change for review?

Also, a comment about the test, "%-1" did not crash when "%-11" did.  Regardless, the
change fixes everything.
